name: MySuperHeroMovie
0:
”Alexa, open My Super Hero Movie”
”Alexa, ask My Super Hero Movie”
”Alexa, launch My Super Hero Movie”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my super hero movie
des:
Congratulations! You've just gotten the lead in a new Super Hero Movie! Alexa will tell you about the supporting characters, locations, and some of the plot lines. It's sure to be a winner. Get your outfit ready for the Oscars!

Hit us up with some 5 star reviews! For every 10 5-star reviews, we will add even more timely and wacky content to the movie! Launch it again to hear what's new. 

Ideas for group gatherings:
~Let each person play and see who gets the funniest combination of scene details
~Vote on the funniest character name
~Decide whose movie name best fits their life! 

Most of all - have a good laugh.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
